thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Square quarterly loss widens as costs rise

title: Square quarterly loss widens as costs rise
text:
May 2, 2018 / 8:17 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago Square quarterly loss widens as costs rise Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 2 (Reuters) - Payments processor Square Inc reported a bigger quarterly loss on Wednesday as the company spent more on product development and marketing.
The company, led by Twitter Inc Chief Executive Officer Jack Dorsey, said loss widened to $24 million, or 6 cents per share, in the first quarter ended March 31, from $15.1 million, or 4 cents per share, a year earlier. ( bit.ly/2KxSUPJ )
Total revenue rose to $668.6 million from $461.6 million. (Reporting by Diptendu Lahiri in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila)
